scripts.start:webpack: concurrently "pnpm --filter native-federation-tests-typescript-remote dev:webpack" "wait-on http://localhost:3000 && pnpm --filter native-federation-tests-typescript-host dev:webpack"
scripts.start:vite: concurrently "pnpm --filter native-federation-tests-typescript-remote dev:vite" "wait-on http://localhost:3000 && pnpm --filter native-federation-tests-typescript-host dev:vite"
scripts.start:rspack: concurrently "pnpm --filter native-federation-tests-typescript-remote dev:rspack" "wait-on http://localhost:3000 && pnpm --filter native-federation-tests-typescript-host dev:rspack"
